title: Harborside: Moving on From Legacy Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: California is perhaps the most attractive cannabis market and certainly the most mature so it's no doubt strong players are interested. Matt Hawkins, founder of Entourage Effect Capital, recently came on as Chairman of Harborside, a legacy California company. Goal of being the best single state operator, moving on from fights with IRS, and confident about banking. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
